Package Nerdle.Model

Class User

  • java.lang.Object
    • Nerdle.Model.User
  • public class User
extends java.lang.Object
    A User plus methods for loading and saving scores

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor Description
      User​(java.lang.String name)
      note: when there is no user with the given name it will create a new users (based on score files)

      • saveResult

        void saveResult​(Answer answer,
                Difficulty difficulty,
                int nAttempts)
         throws NerdleException
        adds a score record to the score file of the user
        Parameters:
        answer - the id will be added to the score record
        difficulty -
        nAttempts - number of attempts needed to finish the game (take max+1 when lost)
        Throws:
        NerdleException
